title: A sieve formula for chains of $p$-subgroups
abstract:
Given a finite group $G$ and a prime $p$, we establish the sieve formula,
which is a congruence containing as summands numbers of chains of $p$-subgroups
of $G$ of certain orders. This generalises the Theorem of Sylow-Frobenius,
using Wielandt's approach. Its name stems from the sieve formula from set
theory because of formal similarities.
